message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I believe this split reflects the advantage I have with the inflation working against me.
Your offer was heavily skewed in your favor, Alice. Let's be more realistic. This is my counter-offer.
Bob, let's be practical. I'm significantly impacted by inflation each round. This offer is fair considering the circumstances.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. You're losing far more to inflation than I am. I'm mirroring your previous offer - it's the fairest I can go.
